Desc.eng: I’m from the Ink, but it’s in turmoil. My village is caught in the middle of an Inkstorm. I came here to stop that.
How can you stop something like that?
The Ink is the prime material of all creation, and now somebody is using it to rewrite your world. This forest has already been seriously damaged.
I have a better idea. I’ll take it from here.
I have to stop a secret cult. Continue your mission on your own.
You’ll see giant spheres in this forest. We call them Inkgrubs. They ooze Ink that distorts this world.
You are a gnome, right? I’ve never seen a gnome in my life. Or in my afterlife.
